method_class: Operator learning / PINN / Diffusion / Graph / etc
problem: What problem does this paper solve?
data_setting: Dataset size, PDE, discretization, observation masks, noise, etc.
model_setting: Architecture details, parameterization, hyperparameters that matter.

interesting: Any extra insights (ablations, theory notes, limitations).
